ivory.lsh.data
Class FloatAsBytesWritable

java.lang.Object
  ivory.lsh.data.FloatAsBytesWritable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Writable
public class FloatAsBytesWritable
extends Object
implements Writable

A data structure to optimize space when storing an array of floats. Floats are quantized into byte values and stored as a BytesWritable. maxNorm is a maxNormalization factor required to re-compute float from byte. byte = quantize(float) = ((float/maxNorm)*128)==128 ? 127 : ((float/maxNorm) float = dequantize(byte) = ((byte/128)*maxNorm)

Author:
ferhanture
